name: Unsinkable
description:
is the Unsinkable really unsinkable?

Test for yourself!

A one (better two) day game for the 
#godotjam 2018 

made with godot engine

Programming & Artwork:
David Krause, Daniel Wenz

Musik by:
Guitar: Jan Kuske
Drums and recording: Daniel Wenz

ISSUES:

If your graphic card does not support gles3 try the *Gles2 downloads!
(you don't see the nice water shader though, sorry for this)
